snippet: Fire officials in Providence said an accident that injured nine performers with the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus on Sunday apparently occurred when a metal fastener snapped.
abstract: Fire officials in Providence, RI, say accident that injured nine performers with Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus apparently occurred when a metal fastener snapped, causing an apparatus to plummet 30 feet to the ground; circus has cancelled two performances but says performances planned for Hartford will proceed as scheduled.
lead_paragraph: Fire officials in Providence said an accident that injured nine performers with the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus on Sunday apparently occurred when a metal fastener snapped.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Circus Accident Linked to Metal Fastener
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Circus Accident Linked to Metal Fastener

keywords.value: Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus
